divs: Sighting Detailsufo moved across the sky west to east like a plane would then stoped made two moves a plane could never made sharp fast moves all most like a z then light changed to a pinkish pin point and headed south east out of sight as i watched this thing travel across the sky i could not comprehend what i was seeing
trends: There has been one other sighting in Zeeland
There were no other sightings in Zeeland on or around July 18th 2009
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: small ball of fire moving slow accross sky west to east with a red glow moving back and forth across top of fire ball
